title: AT101ET
author: AT101ET
created_time: November 09, 2022, 11:47:54 PMLast edit: December 12, 2023, 06:11:25 PM by AT101ET
content: Looking for serious offers on this incredible set. Comes complete (matching serials) with a custom display box. More info on the set: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5135801.0Coins are loaded with 0.02 BTC each. Asking 1 BTCThanks! Picture link updated. Thanks @ Edits.
